reviewText: I believe I purchased all new films and not any used.  Therefore I expected  to receive a film that the picture is clear and the sound does not need to be adjusted during the whole film.  I have a few more films to view however, I pretty much had to stop watching as I as getting irritaded because the sound was terrible or the picture was not clear.  BAD QUALITY.
summary: SOUND IS TERRIBLE ON MOST OF THE FILMS.  A few of the stories were good.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I have realized that I enjoy newer movies more than many of the classics.  This cd was a great value if you enjoy the classics.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I was surprised that some of the movies were in B&W and were produced during the forties. But those movies were great.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: this collection was affordable, came on time as promisd and in good condition.  Not all the movies are great, but some are making it very worth purchasing.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: Only ONE of the 6 movies has K. Knightley in it.  The rest are old black and white movies, so don't waste your money on it.
summary: Only 1 movie has Keira in it
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I already had the black and white versions of the movies.  I thought these were the new movies.  It was lying advertisement.
summary: I thought it was the new in color  version.  They used her picture to get you to buy it.  It was the black and white old movies.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I was disappointed as I was to believe that all six films were stared by Keira Knightley, however I have not watch all of them yet. I might be in for a surprise.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I really didn't like the way they put these movies together. Old and new they need to keep old with old and new with new. Some of the movies were B budget.
summary: It had a mixture of old and new
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: The Keira Knightley film was OK, Anna Karenina is a classic, but the remaining films are not so great. The second disk was unbearably bad, especially The Strange Loves of Martha Ivers, Patterns and the corny Magic Sword. Pergatory to watch these. I threw it in the trash. Not worth the $4.99. Good fast shipping though.
summary: Threw second disk away it was so bad
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: PERHAPS A MUCH YOUNGER GENERATION WILL LIKE IT.  THE PLOT HAS BEEN DONE A MILLION TIMES AND NOT THAT WELL IN THIS MOVIE.  I CAN'T RECOMMEND IT AT ALL.
summary: DID NOT CARE FOR THIS MOVIE.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: Yep... chick flicks... gotta have'm for those home bound hazy lazy days... curl up w/a cup of coco and let the heart float...
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: Enjoyed every one of the movies and will watch again. Also liked the price, have never found movies so inexpensive
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: This was a gift for my aunt who absolutely loved every one of the films.  She love's anything that has been or will be on the Hallmark Channel.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: This was a good combination of old dramas with modern day dramas, Excellent acting and very good value for money.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: THE VIDEO "LAST NIGHT" WAS A SURPRISE AND INSIGHTFUL, I DID NOT KNOW THAT THE OTHER FILMS WERE IN BLACK AND WHITE,
summary: A SURPRISE IN THE BLACK AND WHITE VIDEO
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I think only one of the movies were acceptable,  Keira is such a tremendous actress, this one did not do her justice.
Title: Six Film Epic Romances

reviewText: I was delighted to find this collection of new and old movies on Amazon.  However...some of the older selections were of very inferior quality and that was a big disapointment, I know they are older offerings...but I have seen them before and the quality was far superior to this offering.  The Keira Knightly movie was the exception.
summary: Quality of the movies were mixed
Title: Six Film Epic Romances
